content.rendered:
December 15th, 2023 

Today is a “B” Day 
 

  

 Club Meetings and Information December 15th, 2023 

 

Team Douglas and Lowrie will be selling popcorn during all lunches today.  cost is $1 per bag.

International Club will meet after school on Wednesday, December 13 to learn about New Year’s Celebrations around the world. All are welcome to join us! 

Attention ski club members. Ski Bus Lists are now posted in both cafeterias. Be sure you find a buddy to sit with on the bus and a buddy to ski with prior to our first day of ski club. We DO NOT change the bus lists for any reason. 

Hand Drum Club will meet on Monday, 12/18 in room A118 at 2:30. 

  

Check out the Maple Avenue Club Calendar for club meetings and room information! 

As always, BE SAFE, BE RESPECTFUL, BE RESPONSIBLE, BE KIND! 

make it a great day, or not… the choice is yours!
